--- title: say_hello keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "a function to say hello to somebody" ---

say_hello[source]

say_hello(to)

Say hello to somebody

say_hello('Minkyu')

Hello Minkyu!

assert say_hello("Jeremy")=="Hello Jeremy!"

Hello Jeremy!
